channel.title: Dr. Dre on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Dr. Dre on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Dr. Dre’s SSL Mixing Console — Used on Songs by Eminem, Kendrick Lamar, Jay-Z and More — Sells for a Record $165,000
item.description: Dr. Dre’s SSL 4000 G+ mixing console — used on landmark albums by himself, Eminem, Kendrick Lamar, 50 Cent, Jay-Z, Snoop Dogg, Gwen Stefani, Mary J. Blige, and many others — was auctioned off for $165
